What causes Gardner syndrome ?,"What causes Gardner syndrome? Gardner syndrome is caused by changes (mutations) in the APC gene, which is called a ""tumor suppressor."" Tumor suppressor genes encode proteins that are part of the system that controls cell growth and division. These proteins
